üì¢Exciting News about WORLDEF DUBAI! We are excited to announce our new strategic partnership with WORLDEF! üåü This collaboration will enhance our efforts for WORLDEF DUBAI by bringing together the strengths and networks of both organizations. With this partnership, we aim to foster greater connectivity, foster innovation and open new doors for e-businesses in the Gulf region. We especially thank President Kanat Kutluk for his support and vision that made this partnership possible. Stay tuned for more updates as we continue to build a dynamic and thriving e-commerce ecosystem. #worldef2024 #tbc #dcc #dubai #ecommerce

We are thrilled to share the success of the Turkish Business Council‚Äôs 17th Annual General Assembly held on June 26th, 2024. The event was a testament to our thriving and united community. A special announcement of the evening was the exciting news that Emirates NBD has joined us as the Turkish Business Council‚Äôs Strategic Partner! üéâ This collaboration marks a significant milestone in our journey, and we look forward to the opportunities this partnership will bring. We also extend our deepest gratitude to the Dubai Chambers, the Consul General of the Republic of Turkey H.E. Onur SAYLAN, the commercial attach√©s, and the entire consulate team for their invaluable support. Your presence and contributions have been instrumental in making this event a resounding success. Swipe through for highlights and moments from the evening ‚û°Ô∏èüì∏ Stay tuned for more updates and let‚Äôs continue to grow together! üåçü§ù #TurkishBusinessCouncilDubai #TogetherWeAreStronger #AnnualGeneralAssembly #DubaiEvents #CommunitySuccess #BusinessNetworking #EmiratesNBD #StrategicPartnership

üéâ Reflecting on the Successful "Business Agility Across Industries" Event! üéâ We are thrilled to share the success of our recent event, "Business Agility Across Industries," held at the Ajman X Innovations and Accelerator Center. This event was organized with the invaluable support of Business Agility MENA - Dubai, Future Agile, Ajman Municipality & Planning Department and PMI UAE Chapter. The event commenced with an inspiring Opening Ceremony by Kanat Kutluk, President of the Turkish Business Council in Dubai & Northern Emirates, who emphasized the importance of business agility in today's dynamic business environment and outcome of new gen. organization at TBC. Then Mr. Khaled Al Hosani, CEO of Ajman Municipality & Planning Department, welcomed all participants to Ajman X Innovations and Accelerator Center. Following the opening, Hiral Bharadia PMP¬Æ and Abdul Saleem from the PMI UAE Chapter conducted an awareness session, introducing the chapter and its initiatives. Nemanand Bobade, a Strategic Program Manager and Digital Transformation Expert from Dubai Customs, delivered a keynote speech on the definition and pillars of business agility, the future of agile practices, and the crucial role of leadership in fostering an agile culture and driving successful transformations. The panel session which moderated by Rƒ±dvan Ak√ßi√ßek, featuring Heba Al Shehhi from Dubai Municipality, Sammani Wanigarathne PMP¬Æ, SAFe¬Æ from Wio Bank, and Waseem Haider from PMI UAE Chapter, shared their experiences and discussed the implementation of business agility across various industries. Ilija Stojanovic, PhD, PMP, from the American University in the Emirates, led a workshop on the practical application of agile planning using Kanban boards in higher education. This session provided valuable insights and hands-on experience to the participants. We extend our heartfelt thanks to all speakers, panelists, and attendees for their participation and contributions, which made this event a resounding success. Special appreciation goes to the PMI UAE Chapter and Ajman Municipality and Planning Department for their collaboration. Looking forward to more such events that drive innovation and agility in the business world!
